docs.text: Jupyter Login Instructions Set NeSI HPC Password Set NeSI HPC Second Factor token Reset password Reset Second Factor
docs.title: Content

docs.text: 1. Jupyter Login Details ¶ Follow https://jupyter.nesi.org.nz/hub/login Enter NeSI username, HPC password and 6 digit second factor token Choose server options as below >>make sure to choose the correct project code nesi02659 , number of CPUs CPUs=4 , memory 8 GB prior to pressing button.
